rows.label: qst701404_msg0001
rows.name:
Ugh. You take out one and two more
take its place!

rows.label: qst701404_msg0003
rows.name:
Well, I could always go ahead and use
my full power...

rows.label: qst701404_msg0004
rows.name:
If you did that, nobody would be
getting through for years.

rows.label: qst701404_msg0007
rows.name:
There should be something about it
in my journal...

rows.label: qst701404_msg0008
rows.name:
If I remember correctly, there's a
particular smell that Tizza Parisax
absolutely can't stand.

rows.label: qst701404_msg0009
rows.name: Is that something we could use?

rows.label: qst701404_msg0010
rows.name:
You mean, to keep them away, so they
don't attack us?

rows.label: qst701404_msg0012
rows.name:
The stuff is called Pestronella Oil. We'd
have to gather the ingredients for it.

rows.label: qst701404_msg0013
rows.name:
Adel, do you happen to know where
one might find the Pestronella plant?

rows.label: qst701404_msg0014
rows.name:
I'm pretty sure I've heard of
Pestronella blooming in the
Verdant Fairylands.

rows.label: qst701404_msg0015
rows.name:
Then perhaps we should retreat
for now and consider this option.

rows.label: qst701404_msg0016
rows.name:
Absolutely! Let's go and gather some
Pestronella!

rows.label: qst701404_msg0017
rows.name:
Kagutsuchi can make the oil and then we
can come back and try it out on
these pesky things.
